jpg

Class JpgParser.JpgSegmentData

  • java.lang.Object
    • jpg.JpgParser.JpgSegmentData
  • Enclosing class:
    JpgParser

    private static class JpgParser.JpgSegmentData
extends java.lang.Object
    A simple immutable data carrier for the raw byte arrays of the different metadata segments found in a JPEG file. This class encapsulates the raw EXIF, ICC, and XMP data payloads.
